description: This source file defines several React functional components for rendering various types of charts using the Recharts library. Components include TrendLineChart, MultiSeriesLineChart, StackedBarChart, and PieBreakdownChart, all geared towards visualizing data in a minimalist UI with a focus on simplicity and theme consistency.

methods.name: TrendLineChart({ data, dataKey = "value", xKey = "date", color = "#374151", gradient = false, height = 220 })
methods.description: A React component that renders a minimal trend line or area chart with optional gradient fill, customizable via props.

methods.name: MultiSeriesLineChart({ data, xKey = "date", series = [ { key: "aws", label: "AWS", color: "#F59E0B" },  { key: "azure", label: "Azure", color: "#3B82F6" },  { key: "gcp", label: "GCP", color: "#10B981" },  ], height = 260, showLegend = true, })
methods.description: A React component that renders a multi-series line chart with a legend, suitable for comparing multiple data series over a common x-axis.

methods.name: StackedBarChart({ data, keys, colors, xKey = "name", height = 260, legend = true })
methods.description: A React component that renders a stacked bar chart for comparing categories across multiple data keys.

methods.name: PieBreakdownChart({ data, dataKey = "value", nameKey = "name", colors = DEFAULT_COLORS, height = 260, innerRadius = 60 })
methods.description: A React component that renders a pie chart for categorical data breakdowns, supporting custom colors and inner radius.

ctags.name: MultiSeriesLineChart
ctags.signature: ({ data, xKey = "date", series = [ { key: "aws", label: "AWS", color: "#F59E0B" },  { key: "azure", label: "Azure", color: "#3B82F6" },  { key: "gcp", label: "GCP", color: "#10B981" },  ], height = 260, showLegend = true, })

ctags.signature: ({ data, dataKey = "value", nameKey = "name", colors = DEFAULT_COLORS, height = 260, innerRadius = 60 })

ctags.pattern: /^export function StackedBarChart({ data, keys, colors, xKey = "name", height = 260, legend = true/
ctags.signature: ({ data, keys, colors, xKey = "name", height = 260, legend = true })

ctags.pattern: /^export function TrendLineChart({ data, dataKey = "value", xKey = "date", color = "#374151", grad/
